page.title: 19Schools
page.content: { Yeo Moor Infant}and{Junior Schools } provide the education for many 4-11 yr. olds in this area.{ { Mr Lewis}has been head of the{Infant {School}since it was opened in{1972.} There are {9}teaching and {22}non _ teaching staff to look after {248}4_7 yr. olds in {7} classrooms and{1} terrapin. They have had notable success with their float entries in Clevedon carnival. { Mrs Crombie}has been head of the{15} year old{Junior School}for{8}years. With {10}teaching and{15}non teaching staff, she is responsible for{325}7_11 year olds. The school is open plan with{8}indoor and{3}outdoor classrooms ({1}used as a music room) plus a large hall and a well equipped library. Outside the adjacent schools is a large playing field, a swimming pool and playgrounds.
